title: Circle of the Moon
content:
your character Astarion vampire bite buff remains on the wild shape form, probably making him one of the better wild shape users. Illithid powers DOES NOT work while wild shaped, tested on luck of the far realms, only triggers on human form.

All Druid Spells in Baldur's Gate 3

You can search by Name, Level, School, Casting and Time. Just type into the search box what you are looking for.
